products.title: Splash Indigo Blue Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Indigo Blue Roller Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £7.96 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Splash range of fabrics are both beautiful & contemporary. This dark blue, almost navy, roller blind is a very stylish, on trend colour choice. Our roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring acorn pull which removes the need for a control chain, making it inherently child safe. Our Splash Indigo Blue roller fabric is also moisture resistant which means it is the best choice for bathrooms and kitchens. At Swift Direct Blinds, our roller blinds are put together by the industry experts with decades of experience behind them, as such we are so confident with our high quality products, that this roller blind is covered with our FREE 5 year guarantee, provided for extra peace of mind when investing in our blinds.

products.title: Splash Midnight Blue Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Midnight Blue Roller Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £9.35 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Splash range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish, the fabric offers wonderful light filtering properties & in addition to this is also moisture resistant. This range of fabrics are the perfect choice for kitchens, bathrooms & en-suites. This rich Midnight Blue roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering properties meaning you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room. This dark blue fabric will look stunning paired with natural wooden tones or will offer a perfect splash of colour when hung in a cool, compemporary scheme. Our rollers are great for privacy and light control. Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This blue roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.

products.title: Splash Tiffany Blue 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Tiffany Blue 89mm Vertical Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £9.70 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A family favourite, our Splash range comes in a wide variety of colours and blinds.  Splash Tiffany Blue is a chic light blue vertical blind - perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home.  This light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this blue vertical blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant! Our quality made to measure vertical blinds are a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Whether its fully closed, binge-watching the latest riveting TV drama, or letting the light in (but keeping your privacy), our vertical blinds are great for privacy and light control.Coming with sleek white components and quality-checked by our blind experts, quality is paramount.  At Swift Direct Blinds with over 50 years making and selling blinds under our belt, not only is this vertical blind made by the experts,  it also comes with a fabulous five year guarantee - extra assurance that you are investing in quality that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Turquoise Blue Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Turquoise Blue Panel Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £36.61 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash Turquoise Blue Panel blinds are a fabulous way to dress your window.  The mid blue, moisture-resistant fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space.  Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe.  As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with our 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.  
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0262 Fabric Colour: Turquoise Blue Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Aluminium 5 channel track     Control Type: Cord or Wand Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Tiffany Blue Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Tiffany Blue Panel Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £36.61 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Splash Tiffany Blue Panel blinds are a quick and stylish way to fill a space.  This bright blue dim-out fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space.  Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe.  As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with our 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.  
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This blue panel blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. Still not sure? Why not check out our industry-leading SizeSure measuring-insurance, or if really in rush browse our SwiftTrack blinds, for delivery next day!

products.title: Splash Sapphire Blue Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Sapphire Blue Panel Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £36.61 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our moisture-resistant Splash Sapphire Blue panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space.  The lush dark blue panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its cool, saturated shade. 
 
As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,.5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make.  A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design. 
 
Panel blinds add a really modern feel to any space and at Swift Direct Blinds, when purchasing this blue blind you will also be able to take advantage of our free 5 year guarantee, which means investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Indigo Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Indigo Blue Electric Roller Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £122.00 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Splash range of fabrics are both beautiful & contemporary.  This dark blue, almost navy, electric roller blind is a very stylish, on trend colour choice.   Our electric roller blinds removes the need for a control chain, making it inherently child safe.  Our Splash Indigo Blue roller fabric is also moisture resistant which means it is the best choice for bathrooms and kitchens.  At Swift Direct Blinds, our modern, electric roller blinds are put together by the industry experts with decades of experience behind them, as such we are so confident with our high quality products, that this roller blind is covered with our FREE 5 year guarantee, provided for extra peace of mind when investing in our blinds. 
 
 
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2047 Fabric Colour: Indigo Blue Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.productdescription:

Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space, and are cordless and therefore child-safe by design.   At Swift Direct Blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of our free 5 year guarantee, which means investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Smoke Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Smoke Blue Electric Roller Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £133.32 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Splash range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish which has wonderful light filtering properties.  Perfect for offering privacy without completely blocking out all the light.  Our Splash range is also moisture resistant making it a perfect addition within for kitchens, bathrooms and en-suites.  
 
 This Splash Smoke Blue electric roller blind will update and brighten any interior. The medium blue of the fabric will look stunning when paired with natural wooden tones and is the perfect splash of colour to compliment cool, contemporary grey shades. Our electric rollers are inherently child safe as they require no cords to operate & electric roller blinds are perfect for more dificult to reach windows as they can be operated with a remote control. They also introduce an exceptionally modern feel within the space. 
 
 At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This blue roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
